https://t.co/2icBQjNEEi https://t.co/cBVdeOge2x

@Tottystilla However, it is essential to wait for a specialized reservation agent to support you...2/2 ST.

@Tottystilla Totty, We understand the inconvenience and concern for this contingency so all our channels are overloaded, we assure you that we are working on offering assistance to each of our passengers and their requirements...1/2 ST

@adi21739556 @adi21739556, we regret all the inconveniences you´ve had. Please be so kind to contact us at 1 800 237 6639 in USA where a representative of ours will be pleased to provide the assistance and an option to restore your itinerary. ST
